title: Outlaw
description: MR. FEBRUARYMan: Tennessee Blackthorn, ramrod of the Rocking M, as hard and unyielding as the high-plains country that was his domain. Woman: Archaeologist Diana Saxton, obsessed with the past--afraid of the present. Challenge: To unlock the secrets of the land and the passion in Diana's heart.Tennessee Blackthorn was a man to be reckoned with. Tall and commanding, the sexy ranch hand was afraid of neither man nor beast... but he just might have met his match in Diana. Could she heal his wounded heart and make him forget the ache of the bitter lessons of the past?WESTERN LOVERS: Men as tough and untamed as the land they call home.
author: Elizabeth Lowell
